docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. James J. Scheiner is a respected orthopedic surgeon in Fairfax, Va., with a long record of having tested the safety of drugs. For years, Johnson Johnson's, Ortho Pharmaceutical Corporation and other major companies hired him to test experimental drugs on his patients and then submitted the results of those tests as proof of the safety and efficacy ...

headline.main: PUTTING DRUG TESTERS TO THE TEST
